definition: to spread out/to open up/to exhibit/to put into effect/to postpone/to prolong/exhibition
building/shop/term for certain service establishments/embassy or consulate/schoolroom (old)/CL:家[jia1]

sentences.english: Shenzhen Design Fair pavilions are askance of the seventh.
sentences.chinese: 深圳设计之都睥第七届文博会展馆。

sentences.english: Virtual passports are stamped at each national pavilion.
sentences.chinese: 每个展馆都会帮你在虚拟护照上盖章。

sentences.english: The Elevated Pedestians' Walk may guide you to all pavilions.
sentences.chinese: 经过园区的高架平台能够利便地来回于各个展馆。

sentences.english: I have occasionally taught a course in which students copy paintings in the museum.
sentences.chinese: 我教过一门课专门让学生临摹展馆里的绘画。

sentences.english: I was busy in FHC in daytime, after out off office I went out.
sentences.chinese: 白天就呆在展馆里面忙，晚上就到外面逛。

sentences.english: The xylophone-like surfaces frame a pathway that forms the pavilion's perimeter.
sentences.chinese: 类似木琴的表面形成了一条小路，围绕在展馆的四周。

sentences.english: The concept also comprises the entire interior design and essential parts of the interior fittings.
sentences.chinese: 展馆概念还包括整个内部设计和内部装修的重要部分。

sentences.english: The three-story Republic of Korea Pavilion is composed of 20 basic letters of the ROK alphabet.
sentences.chinese: 三层的韩国展馆是由20个基本的韩语字组成。

sentences.english: Over 100 participating nations competed to build the best pavilion.
sentences.chinese: 超过100个参与者参与建造最佳的展馆。

sentences.english: Please check conference schedule at South Entrance Hall and outside the halls for the latest updates.
sentences.chinese: 请查看南入口厅和各展馆入口处的最新信息。

sentences.english: Some halls are close to each other while others are far apart.
sentences.chinese: 有些展馆挨得很近，可是另一些就隔得很远。

sentences.english: Tarpaulin supports which by the branch, has formed the height fluctuation exhibition hall roofing.
sentences.chinese: 以树枝支起的篷布，形成了高低起伏的展馆屋面。

sentences.english: Two other exhibits dedicated to displaying various species of antelope are also closing.
sentences.chinese: 另外两个专门展览各种羚羊的展馆也将关闭。

sentences.english: More than 200 countries and groups have one – but the US may be a no-show.
sentences.chinese: 超过两百个国家和组织有展馆，但美国可能放弃。

sentences.english: Prestressed string structure was used in Modern Agriculture Exhibition Center of Changchun city.
sentences.chinese: 长春现代农博园展馆屋面采用预应力张弦结构。

definition: relative position of exhibition booth/allocated floor space for display stall/allotted exhibit area
building/shop/term for certain service establishments/embassy or consulate/schoolroom (old)/CL:家[jia1]
to display and sell (e.g. at a fair)/sales exhibition
to exhibit at or take part in a trade show etc
